{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ALFA Network |model=AC1200R |revision= |ean=4718050302253 |asin=B00V5KWQW4 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=now |fcc_date=05/12/2015 |fcc_id=2AB87197D |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8197DN |cpu1_cspeed=660 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L6406E |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 12-pad header,, J20 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, J21 |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8192ER |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi2_chip1_model=RTL8812AR |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8367RB |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }} {{TagLine|AC1200 Wide-Range Wi-Fi Router}} :[http://www.alfa.com.tw/products_show.php?pc=134&ps=217 Product page]
*[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/alfa.network/ac1200r ''AC1200R'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] *[http://www.yacht-wifi.com/en/alfa-network-ac1200r-2 ''AC1200R'' on '''Jacht-WiFi'''] :4x 5dBi detachable external Dual Band antennas
===Key Features=== :► AC1200 Wi-Fi - 2.4GHz (300Mbps) + 5GHz (867Mbps) :► Wireless coverage for your entire home/office :► 4x 5dBi external antennas provide maximum wireless coverage :► Easy wireless security encryption with the WPS button :► Full gigabit ports ensure ultra fast data transfer speeds :► IPv6 supported, meeting the demands for the next generation :► Simple and Easy setup wizard
===FCC ID=== :'''FCC ID:''' [https://fccid.io/UQ2 UQ2] - [[ALFA Network]] • [https://fccid.io/2AB87 2AB87] - ''Iconnect'' *[[ALFA Network AWUS1900]] - FCC ID: 2AB878814 (2017-06-28) :''802.11ac Dual-Band Long-Range USB Adapter'' *[[ALFA Network WiFi Pineapple NANO]] - [https://fccid.io/2AB87-NANO 2AB87-NANO] (2016-02-02) :''WiFi Pineapple NANO'' (USB 2.0, 5V/2A, 2x ext. ant.) *[[ALFA Network AWUS052NH]] - FCC ID: 2AB87572 (2015-06-11) :''Dual-Band 2.4/5 GHz Long-Range USB Adapter'' *[[ALFA Network AP120C]] - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/2AB87934 2AB87934] (2015-05-12) :''Concurrent Dual-Radios 2.4/5GHz MIMO AP/CPE'' :CPU: [[Atheros]] AR9344, WLAN Mini PCIe Card: AR9582 *[[ALFA Network AC1200R]] - FCC ID: 2AB87197D (2015-05-12) :''AC1200 Wide-Range WiFi Router'' (RTL8197D) *[[ALFA Network AWUS036NHV]] - FCC ID: 2AB878188 (2014-08-29) :''802.11bgn Long Range USB Adapter'' (RTL8188) *[[ALFA Network AWUS036AC]] - FCC ID: 2AB878812 (2014-08-26) :''802.11ac AC1200 USB Adapter'' (RTL8812AU) *[[ALFA Network Tube 2H]] - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/2AB879331 2AB879331] (2014-05-22) :''802.11n Long-Range Outdoor AP/CPE'' ([https://fccid.io/2AB879331/Schematics/Schematics-2274415 AR9331]) *[[ALFA Network AIP-W511]] - FCC ID: 2AB87511 (2014-05-02) :''802.11n 150M Ultra Wireless LAN Router''
